title: [RESOLVED] Server Issues - 21st Jan 2015
body:
Hi folks,

We're looking into an issue with the OCE League of Legends servers at the moment, which is causing games to not start/end correctly.

[I'll post updates here when I have them.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/TEEeBys5-server-issues-21st-jan-2015)

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: My game crashed after winning the game and I just bought an IP boost :( I got 5 people to play and bought a 3 day of IP boost to stack up IP boost. Can I get some kind of compensation for this?
